channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender AV for Mac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender AV for Mac

item.title: CVE-2019-17103|2024-09-16T19:09:06.678Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20av%20for%20mac
item.description: An Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the BDLDaemon component of Bitdefender AV for Mac allows an attacker to elevate permissions to read protected directories. This issue affects: Bitdefender AV for Mac versions prior to 8.0.0.
